page.title: 07WHAT MY MUM DOES ON FRIDAYS.
page.content: My Mum gets up at 7.45 a.m. and goes downstairs to make me,Alex and Emily some breakfast.Then she leaves us to get dressed.When she is dressed she shouts at my brother to brush his hair. When we are ready she takes us to school in the car and she goes shopping.She goes shopping in Arnold and Nottingham.On the way back from shopping she collects Alex and Emily from school. When I get home from Caroline's house she makes our tea and then we go swimming.Afterwards we have fish and chips.Mum goes to bed at about 11.30 p.m.
